note.p: Née Hume. Married Charles Gubbins of the Bengal Civil Service in 1843. Lived in India in the 1840s. Surname changed to Bathoe before husband’s death in 1866. Lived at 6 Bryanston Square, London, in 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/166/86/46)
Correspondence vol. 19, letter from M. B. Bathoe, 25 March [1871]
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 March 2015)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 March 2015)
